title: 05/04/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 05/04/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, the Aaron Rodgers saga continues as to where he may want to go

and what’s next in the drama. First, Chris Mannix joins the show in the first hour to talk about

the greatness of Russell Westbrook and the Lakers’ situation. Next, Packers reporter Rob

Demovsky chats with Dan to give the latest info on the Rodgers drama, saying it’s an “eight or

nine” on the drama scale. Lastly, Portland Trail Blazers star Damian Lillard joins in the final hour

to talk about his teammate Carmelo Anthony, his own legacy, and how he views himself among

some of the greats in the game.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
